"Echo": "These flower-like things... They explode when you stimulate them?"
"So if we take those Darkers and wrap them up in it, it would blow them away. That'd work..."

"この花みたいなもの……
刺激を与えると爆発するのか。"

"あのダーカー共を巻き込んで
消し飛ばすのも、ありですね……"
